About.title: About Us
About.content:
Bloomtalya Pansiyon, which opened in 2023,
 is delighted to welcome you, our esteemed guests, in one of the most beautiful locations in Antalya.
 Our rooms, designed with modern architecture and attention to every detail,
 are equipped with the highest quality standards, ensuring that every aspect is meticulously provided for your comfort.
 Located in the center of Antalya, our hotel offers easy access to the city's main attractions, including the enchanting Kaleiçi district.
 Just a 15-minute walk from the historic Kaleiçi, Bloomtalya Pansiyon is the ideal starting point for discovering the beauty that Antalya has to offer.
